```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Importa data
```{r, warning=FALSE}
data = read_csv("wmd_distances.csv") %>% filter(content_processed_size >=6)
```

# number of pros and cons per topic
```{r}
data %>% 
  select(topic, arg_orient, pro_con) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  group_by(topic, arg_orient) %>% 
  summarise(n = n())
```

# most similar paragraph to each argument
```{r}
sim_para2arg = data %>% 
  group_by(topic,arg_orient,pro_con) %>%
  summarise(wmd_sim = max(wmd_sim)) %>%
  inner_join(data)
```

```{r}
sim_para2arg %>% select(topic, arg_orient, source) %>% table()
```
